name: BrewIt
description:
Welcome to the world of potion brewing! Explore new recipes, build new machines and expand your factory   for a higher revenue stream! This all while seeing the machines stand in the real world and environment!

Context

Brew it is a research project created for our final group project assignment at Digital arts and entertainment. We did a research project for our client DAE Research about affordable AR using the new passthrough feature for the oculus quest 2.  

(Digital Arts and Entertainment)

(DAE Research)

It shows how the feature could be used by businesses to display the layout of a potential factory and the layout of it.

Gameplay

In brewit you are in control of the grand wizards potion shop, but instead of brewing everything by hand you decide to build a huge and ever extending factory. 

In this preview version there are 5 quests and potions you have to complete while building your factory. There is a proper tutorial that gives you a head start into the factory building experience and you can even save and load your creations!
